CustomField.formula: (MRR__c * IF(ISPICKVAL(CurrencyIsoCode,"USD") , 1/1.11059, 0))+(MRR__c * IF(ISPICKVAL(CurrencyIsoCode,"AUD") , 1/1.477695, 0))+(MRR__c * IF(ISPICKVAL(CurrencyIsoCode,"CAD") , 1/1.48185, 0))+(MRR__c * IF(ISPICKVAL(CurrencyIsoCode,"CHF") , 1/1.06841, 0))+(MRR__c * IF(ISPICKVAL(CurrencyIsoCode,"GBP") , 1/0.72651, 0))+(MRR__c * IF(ISPICKVAL(CurrencyIsoCode,"ZAR") , 1/14.1605, 0))+(MRR__c * IF(ISPICKVAL(CurrencyIsoCode,"EUR") , 1, 0)+(MRR__c * IF(ISPICKVAL(CurrencyIsoCode,"SEK") , 1/9.358955, 0)))+(MRR__c * IF(ISPICKVAL(CurrencyIsoCode,"AED") , 1/4.07918, 0))
CustomField.label: MRR (fixed exch)
